text.div:
NHSNOccasionOfDetectionCode

Code System: cdcNHSN 2.16.840.1.113883.6.277

A full listing of codes can be found in the hai_voc.xls file provided with this package.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.277
    CodeDisplay
    1505-7Post Discharge Surveillance
    1510-7Admission (during the stay in which the surgery was performed)
    1516-4Readmission to facility where associated procedure performed
    1517-2Readmission to facility other than where the associated procedure was performed
